item.title: CVE-2022-21770|2024-08-03T02:53:35.605Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6781%2C%20mt6877%2C%20mt6879%2C%20mt6893%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8791%2C%20mt8797%2C%20mt8798
item.description: In sound driver, there is a possible information disclosure due to symlink following. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06558663; Issue ID: ALPS06558663.
